text:
MOTEL ACCOMMODATIONS
Oxford is a small town and overnight accom¬
modations are limited. Consequently, we sug¬
gest that those desiring overnight reservations
in Oxford contact one of the following motels
directly:
UHTTi'T RATES
IVIUIEjLi SINGLE DOUBLE

Phone 5 18 523-4323

5495 College Corner Pike
Oxford, Ohio
Phone 5 13 523-4323
Accommodations are also available in Hamil¬
ton, Ohio — 14 miles south of Oxford.
